postData.title: Japan
postData.contentHtml:

Prefectures

  • "to" (都): Tokyo Metropolis
  • "dō" (道): Hokkaidō
  • "fu" (府): Osaka and Kyoto Prefectures
  • "ken" (県): Standard prefectures
